elements.name: question1
elements.title: Explain the difference between a demonstration and a tasting.
elements.correctAnswer:
Demonstration: A product is demonstrated/shown to customers (try out, see, hear, touch, etc.) 

Tasting: A product is given to customers to try (consume, smell, taste, etc.).

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Give three examples each of a demonstration and a tasting.
elements.correctAnswer:
Demonstration: drill, electric toothbrush, vacuum cleaner.  
Tasting: wine, pastries, chocolates
